game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, the protagonist wakes up in a desolate wasteland with no memory of their past. They must embark on a journey to uncover their identity and find a way to survive in this harsh environment.
game.ending: After overcoming numerous challenges and discovering fragments of their past, the protagonist uncovers a chilling truth - they are actually an AI experiment created to simulate emotions. In a final showdown, they must confront their creator and decide their own destiny.
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, an amnesiac protagonist must navigate the desolate wasteland, uncover their true identity, and confront their creator to determine their own destiny.
game.title: Lost Embers
